unit.title: De rhetorica || Col. 32 PHerc. 1004 || Diplomatic Apparatus

dsl.content: 1 ]υε[ -4 (ζ, π), (ο, ε, θ, ϲ) 2 ]ω[ -4 desc., vest. 4 ]ω[ -4 sup. vest., (π, γι) 5 ]λ[ -4 dext. sup. bracchium vel ramus, inf. vert. 6 ]τω[ -4 7 ]ντουϲπολι[ -4 8 ]ϲαδεαυτ[ -4 dext. sup. vest., (ω, ο, ε, θ, ϲ), inf. vert. 9 ]α[ -4 sup. vest. ]ωιδικα[ -4 10 ]ντ[ -4 inf. vest.
